pyqgis_plugin.name: Rics Attribute Checker
pyqgis_plugin.description: This plugin check attribute data conformity to data dictionary. The plugin is found under Vector Menu > GMC >Rics Attribute Checker

pyqgis_plugin.name: Kinks Checker
pyqgis_plugin.description: This plugin check kinks in spatial data. The plugin is found under Vector Menu > GMC >Kinks Checker

pyqgis_plugin.name: Splitter
pyqgis_plugin.description: This plugin splits(clips) spatial data by split field in the overlay feature to multiple output feature. Currently supports on 3 output formats namely geojson, geopackage and ESRI Shapefile. The plugin is found under Vector Menu > GMC >Splitter
